languages.text: Если оперативник атакует цель с {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимостью{/g}, такая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} наносит на (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} Восприятия)% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, дополнительно увеличиваемого на 10% за каждую уязвимость на цели. При этом все уязвимости снимаются. Оперативник также может активно применять {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Анализ целей{/g}, чтобы наложить на врага (1 + бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} / 2) уязвимостей. Вторая ключевая способность оперативника, {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Выявление слабостей{/g}, снимает все уязвимости с врага и снижает его {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на (10 + количество уязвимостей × бонус Восприятия)% до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оперативника. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} оперативника накладывает 1 уязвимость на всех врагов в бою, после чего оперативник атакует цель, всегда попадая по ней. Цель этой атаки получает 30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} к уклонению и броне до конца боя. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} оперативника: Интеллект, Восприятие, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} оперативника: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Знания: Ксеносы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Техника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Логика{/g}. Оперативники могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасинами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}великими стратегами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотниками за головами{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.

If an Operative attacks a target afflicted with an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, the attack will deal (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, which is further increased by 10% for each exploit on the target. All exploits on the target are then removed. An Operative can also use {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} actively to apply (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus / 2) exploits on an enemy. The Operative's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, removes all exploits from an enemy to reduce their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −(10 + exploit stacks × Perception bonus)% until the start of the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} inflicts 1 exploit on every enemy in combat, then the Operative attacks a target, landing a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The target suffers a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their dodge and armour until the end of combat. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Intelligence, Perception, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. Operatives can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если адепт атакует цель с уязвимостью, такая атака наносит на 5 × бонус ВОС% больше урона, дополнительно увеличиваемого на 10% за каждую уязвимость на цели. При этом все уязвимости снимаются. Адепт также может активно применять эту способность, чтобы наложить на врага (1 + бонус ИНТ / 2) уязвимостей. Вторая ключевая способность адепта, Выявление слабостей, снимает все уязвимости с врага и снижает его уклонение, парирование и броню на (10 + количество уязвимостей × бонус ВОС)% до начала следующего хода адепта. Героический акт адепта накладывает 1 уязвимость на всех врагов в бою, после чего адепт атакует цель, всегда попадая по ней. Цель этой атаки получает 30% штраф к уклонению и броне до конца боя. Важные характеристики адепта: Интеллект, Восприятие, Ближний Бой, Дальний Бой Навыки адепта: Наблюдательность, Медицина, Знания: Ксеносы, Знания: Империум, Техника, Логика. Адепты могут стать ассасинами, охотниками или стратегами.

traits.locale_text: If an Adept attacks a target afflicted with an exploit, the attack will deal 5 × PER bonus% more damage, which is further increased by 10% for each exploit on the target. All exploits on the target are then removed. An Adept can also use Study Enemies actively to apply (1 + INT bonus / 2) exploits on an enemy. The Adept's second keystone ability, Expose Weakness, removes all exploits from an enemy to reduce their dodge, parry, and armour by −(10 + exploit stacks × PER bonus)% until the start of the Adept's next turn. The Adept's heroic act inflicts 1 exploit on every enemy in combat, then the Adept attacks a target and lands a guaranteed hit. The target suffers a −30% penalty to their dodge and armour until the end of combat. Key characteristics: Intelligence, Perception, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Lore (Xenos), Lore (Imperium), Tech-Use, Logic. Adepts can become Assassins, Hunters, or Strategists.

The Adept's heroic act inflicts 1 exploit on every enemy in combat, then the Adept attacks a target and lands a guaranteed hit. The target suffers a −30% penalty to their dodge and armour until the end of combat. Key characteristics: Intelligence, Perception, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill. Skills: Awareness, Medicae, Lore (Xenos), Lore (Imperium), Tech-Use, Logic. Adepts can become Assassins, Hunters, or Strategists.

languages.text: Greift ein Agent ein Ziel an, das mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} belegt ist, verursacht der Angriff (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}) % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, der pro Ausnutzung auf dem Ziel nochmals um je 10 % ansteigt. Alle Ausnutzungen auf dem Ziel werden anschließend entfernt. Ein Agent kann auch {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Feinde analysieren{/g} aktiv nutzen, um (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}-Bonus / 2) Ausnutzungen auf einen Feind anzuwenden. Die zweite Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Agenten, {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Schwäche offenlegen{/g}, entfernt alle Ausnutzungen von einem Feind, um dessen {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Agenten um (10 + Ausnutzungsstapel × Wahrnehmung-Bonus) % zu reduzieren. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Agenten verursacht 1 Ausnutzung an jedem Feind im Kampf, dann greift der Agent ein Ziel an und landet einen garantierten {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}. Das Ziel erleidet einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30 % auf Ausweichen und Rüstung bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Schlüssel-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: Intelligenz, Wahrnehmung, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigleit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Wissen (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Einsatz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logik{/g}. Agenten können zu {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägern{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henkern{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g} werden.

languages.text: Si un agent attaque une cible subissant une {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g}, l'attaque inflige (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires et ces dégâts augmentent de 10 % par vulnérabilité cumulée sur la cible. Tous les cumuls de vulnérabilité de la cible sont ensuite supprimés. Un agent peut également utiliser activement {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Étude des ennemis{/g} pour appliquer (1 + bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} / 2) vulnérabilités à un ennemi. La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé de l'agent, {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Mise en évidence des points faibles{/g}, consomme toutes les vulnérabilités d'un ennemi afin de réduire son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de −(10 + cumuls de vulnérabilité × bonus de Perception) % jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'agent. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'agent inflige 1 vulnérabilité à chaque ennemi au combat, après quoi, l'agent attaque une cible et la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} systématiquement. La cible subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −30 % à l'esquive et à l'armure jusqu'à la fin du combat. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Intelligence, Perception, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}. Les agents peuvent devenir {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseurs de primes {/g}ou des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grands stratèges{/g}.
languages.original_text: If an Operative attacks a target afflicted with an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, the attack will deal (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, which is further increased by 10% for each exploit on the target. All exploits on the target are then removed. An Operative can also use {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analyse Enemies{/g} actively to apply (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus / 2) exploits on an enemy. The Operative's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Expose Weakness{/g}, removes all exploits from an enemy to reduce their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −(10 + exploit stacks × Perception bonus)% until the start of the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} inflicts 1 exploit on every enemy in combat, then the Operative attacks a target, landing a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. The target suffers a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their dodge and armour until the end of combat. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Intelligence, Perception, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. Operatives can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si un Opérateur attaque une cible subissant un {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, l'attaque inflige (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}) % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires et ces dégâts augmentent de 10 % par exploit cumulé sur la cible. Tous les cumuls d'exploit de la cible sont ensuite supprimés. La cible subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −30 % en termes d'esquive et d'armure jusqu'à la fin du combat. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Intelligence, Perception, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Connaissance (Xénos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logique{/g}. Les Opérateurs peuvent devenir {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Chasseurs de Primes {/g}ou {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Stratégistes{/g}.

languages.text: 当特工攻击受到{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果影响的目标时，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}会提高（5×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）%。此外，目标身上每有1层“研究”效果，造成的伤害都会额外提高10%。此次攻击会移除目标身上所有“研究”层数。 技师也可以主动使用{g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}研究敌人{/g}能力，对敌人施加（1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}加值/2）层“研究”效果。 技师的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}暴露弱点{/g}，可以移除目标敌人所有“研究”层数，令目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低（10+研究层数×感知加值）%，效果持续至技师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。 特工的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}会对战斗中的所有敌人施加1层“研究”效果，随后攻击一名目标。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}目标。此外，目标的闪避与护甲会降低30%，效果持续至战斗结束。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：智力、感知、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}知识（异形）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}科技使用{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}逻辑{/g}。 特工可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}。

languages.text: Si un agente ataca a un objetivo que sufra una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g}, infligirá un (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}) % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Este valor, además, aumenta en un 10 % por cada vulnerabilidad que tenga el objetivo. Una vez terminado, se eliminan todas las vulnerabilidades del objetivo. Los agentes también pueden utilizar {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analizar enemigos{/g} a conciencia para aplicar (1 + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} / 2) vulnerabilidades a un enemigo. La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los agentes, {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Exponer debilidad{/g}, elimina todas las vulnerabilidades de un enemigo para reducir su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −(10 + acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad × bonificación por Percepción) % hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente en cuestión. Operatives can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si un agente ataca a un objetivo que sufra una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g}, infligirá un (5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}) % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Este valor, además, aumenta en un 10 % por cada vulnerabilidad que tenga el objetivo. Una vez terminado, se eliminan todas las vulnerabilidades del objetivo. Los agentes también pueden utilizar {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Analizar enemigos{/g} a conciencia para aplicar (1 + bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} / 2) vulnerabilidades a un enemigo. La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los agentes, {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Exponer debilidad{/g}, elimina todas las vulnerabilidades de un enemigo para reducir su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} en un −(10 + acumulaciones de vulnerabilidad × bonificación por Percepción) % hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente en cuestión. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los agentes inflige 1 vulnerabilidad a todos los enemigos en combate para que, a continuación, el agente en cuestión ataque a un objetivo con un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} asegurado. El objetivo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del −30 % a su esquiva y armadura hasta el final del combate. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: Inteligencia, Percepción, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Conocimiento (xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Uso de tecnología{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Lógica{/g}. Los agentes pueden convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesinos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutores{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grandes estrategas{/g}.

languages.original_text: If an adept attacks a target with a vulnerability, that attack deals 5 × the WOS% bonus to damage, with an additional 10% increase for each vulnerability on the target. All vulnerabilities are removed. The adept can also actively use this ability to inflict (1 + INT bonus / 2) Vulnerabilities on an enemy. The adept's second key ability, Identify Weaknesses, removes all vulnerabilities from the enemy and reduces their evasion, parry, and armour by (10 + number of vulnerabilities × WOS bonus)% until the beginning of the adept's next turn. The adept's heroic act inflicts 1 vulnerability on all enemies in combat, after which the adept attacks the target, always hitting it. The target of this attack takes a 30% penalty to evasion and armour for the rest of the combat. Important characteristics of the adept: Intelligence, Perception, Close Combat, Ranged Combat. AdeptSkills: Observation, Medicine, Knowledge: Xenos, Knowledge: Imperium, Technique, Logic. Adepts can become assassins, hunters, or strategists.

languages.text: オペレーターが{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}の影響を受けているターゲットを攻撃すると、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が(5×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})%増加し、またターゲットに影響しているエクスプロイトの数ごとに10％増加する。ターゲットに影響している全てのエクスプロイトは解除される。 オペレーターはまた{g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}敵の調査{/g}を発動し、敵に対して(1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}ボーナ/2)エクスプロイトを適用することができる。 オペレーターの２番目に要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、{g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}弱点の露呈{/g}である。これは、オペレーターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで敵から全てのエクスプロイトを取り除き、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を低減させ、また{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を-(10+エクスプロイトスタック×認知力ボーナス)%減少させる。 オペレーターの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}は戦闘中の全ての敵に1エクスプロイト適用し、またオペレーターのターゲットに対する攻撃は確実に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する。ターゲットは回避およびアーマーに対する−30%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負い、これは戦闘終了時まで継続する。 主な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：知性、認知力、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}伝承（異種族）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}技術使用{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}論理{/g}。 オペレーターは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}、あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}になることができる。

languages.text: Bir Ajan, {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüye{/g} maruz kalmış bir hedefe saldırırsa saldırı %(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}) kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Bu hasar, hedef üzerindeki her bir sömürü için ekstra %10 artar. Saldırının ardından hedefteki tüm sömürüler ortadan kalkar. Bunun yanı sıra Ajan, {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Düşmanı Analiz Et{/g} kabiliyetini aktif olarak kullanarak bir düşmana (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} bonusu / 2) kadar sömürü uygulayabilir. Ajan'ın ikinci kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Zayıflığı İfşa Et{/g} ise bir düşmanın üzerindeki tüm sömürüleri kaldırarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerini %(10 + sömürü birikimi × Algı bonusu) kadar düşürür. Bu etki, Ajan'ın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek devam eder. Ajan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, çatışmadaki her düşmanda 1 sömürü oluşturur. Ardından Ajan bir hedefe saldırdığında {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} yüzde yüz isabetli olur. Hedef, kaçınma ve zırh değerlerine −%30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: Zekâ, Algı, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Kültür (Zeno){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Kültür (İmparatorluk){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tekno Aşinalığı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Mantık{/g}. Ajanlar; {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist'e{/g} dönüşebilirler.

Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Intelligence, Perception, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. Operatives can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunters{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bir Ajan, {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürüye{/g} maruz kalmış bir hedefe saldırırsa saldırı %(5 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}) kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Bu hasar, hedef üzerindeki her bir sömürü için ekstra %10 artar. Saldırının ardından hedefteki tüm sömürüler ortadan kalkar. Bunun yanı sıra Ajan, {g|f:502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c}Düşmanı Analiz Et{/g} kabiliyetini aktif olarak kullanarak bir düşmana (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} bonusu / 2) kadar sömürü uygulayabilir. Ajan'ın ikinci kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan {g|f:fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}Zayıflığı İfşa Et{/g} ise bir düşmanın üzerindeki tüm sömürüleri kaldırarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerini %(10 + sömürü birikimi × Algı bonusu) kadar düşürür. Bu etki, Ajan'ın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek devam eder. Ajan'ın {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, çatışmadaki her düşmanda 1 sömürü oluşturur. Ardından Ajan bir hedefe saldırdığında {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} yüzde yüz isabetli olur. Hedef, kaçınma ve zırh değerlerine −%30 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alır. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: Zekâ, Algı, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Kültür (Zeno){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Kültür (İmparatorluk){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tekno Aşinalığı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Mantık{/g}. Ajanlar; {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Ödül Avcısı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist'e{/g} dönüşebilirler.
